title: Numbers 28:1
text: AND the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,

title: Numbers 28:2
text: Command the children of Israel, and say unto them, My offering, and my bread for my sacrifices made by fire, for a sweet savour unto me, shall ye observe to offer unto me in their due season.

title: Numbers 28:3
text: And thou shalt say unto them, This is the offering made by fire which ye shall offer unto the LORD; two lambs of the first year without spot day by day, for a continual burnt offering.

title: Numbers 28:4
text: The one lamb shalt thou offer in the morning, and the other lamb shalt thou offer at even;

title: Numbers 28:5
text: And a tenth part of an ephah of flour for a meat offering, mingled with the fourth part of an hin of beaten oil.

title: Numbers 28:6
text: It is a continual burnt offering, which was ordained in mount Sinai for a sweet savour, a sacrifice made by fire unto the LORD.

title: Numbers 28:7
text: And the drink offering thereof shall be the fourth part of an hin for the one lamb: in the holy place shalt thou cause the strong wine to be poured unto the LORD for a drink offering.

title: Numbers 28:8
text: And the other lamb shalt thou offer at even: as the meat offering of the morning, and as the drink offering thereof, thou shalt offer it, a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the LORD.

title: Numbers 28:9
text: And on the sabbath day two lambs of the first year without spot, and two tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, and the drink offering thereof:

title: Numbers 28:10
text: This is the burnt offering of every sabbath, beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.

title: Numbers 28:11
text: And in the beginnings of your months ye shall offer a burnt offering unto the LORD; two young bullocks, and one ram, seven lambs of the first year without spot;

title: Numbers 28:12
text: And three tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, for one bullock; and two tenth deals of flour for a meat offering, mingled with oil, for one ram;

title: Numbers 28:13
text: And a several tenth deal of flour mingled with oil for a meat offering unto one lamb; for a burnt offering of a sweet savour, a sacrifice made by fire unto the LORD.

title: Numbers 28:14
text: And their drink offerings shall be half an hin of wine unto a bullock, and the third part of an hin unto a ram, and a fourth part of an hin unto a lamb: this is the burnt offering of every month throughout the months of the year.

title: Numbers 28:15
text: And one kid of the goats for a sin offering unto the LORD shall be offered, beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.

title: Numbers 28:16
text: And in the fourteenth day of the first month is the passover of the LORD.

title: Numbers 28:17
text: And in the fifteenth day of this month is the feast: seven days shall unleavened bread be eaten.

title: Numbers 28:18
text: In the first day shall be an holy convocation; ye shall do no manner of servile work therein:

title: Numbers 28:19
text: But ye shall offer a sacrifice made by fire for a burnt offering unto the LORD; two young bullocks, and one ram, and seven lambs of the first year: they shall be unto you without blemish:

title: Numbers 28:20
text: And their meat offering shall be of flour mingled with oil: three tenth deals shall ye offer for a bullock, and two tenth deals for a ram;

title: Numbers 28:21
text: A several tenth deal shalt thou offer for every lamb, throughout the seven lambs:

title: Numbers 28:22
text: And one goat for a sin offering, to make an atonement for you.

title: Numbers 28:23
text: Ye shall offer these beside the burnt offering in the morning, which is for a continual burnt offering.

title: Numbers 28:24
text: After this manner ye shall offer daily, throughout the seven days, the meat of the sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the LORD: it shall be offered beside the continual burnt offering, and his drink offering.

title: Numbers 28:25
text: And on the seventh day ye shall have an holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work.

title: Numbers 28:26
text: Also in the day of the firstfruits, when ye bring a new meat offering unto the LORD, after your weeks be out, ye shall have an holy convocation; ye shall do no servile work:

title: Numbers 28:27
text: But ye shall offer the burnt offering for a sweet savour unto the LORD; two young bullocks, one ram, seven lambs of the first year;

title: Numbers 28:28
text: And their meat offering of flour mingled with oil, three tenth deals unto one bullock, two tenth deals unto one ram,

title: Numbers 28:29
text: A several tenth deal unto one lamb, throughout the seven lambs;

title: Numbers 28:30
text: And one kid of the goats, to make an atonement for you.

title: Numbers 28:31
text: Ye shall offer them beside the continual burnt offering, and his meat offering, (they shall be unto you without blemish) and their drink offerings.
